app.title: Jambiz Advent Calendar
app.subtitle: One tiny challenge a day, one fun fact as a reward
app.welcome: Welcome to the Jambiz Advent Calendar!
app.intro: Join us for 24 days of festive fun, challenges, and surprises. Unlock a new door each day to reveal a mini-game or puzzle and learn something new about your colleagues and company!

day1.question: I'm tall when I'm young, and I'm short when I'm old. What am I?
day1.hint: You light me during celebrations and power outages.

day5.question: I have branches, but no fruit, trunk, or leaves. What am I?
day5.hint: You decorate me at Christmas time

day10.question: I'm white, I'm cold, I fall from the sky, and kids love to play in me. What am I?
day10.hint: You can make a snowman out of me

day11.question: What do you get when you cross a snowman with a vampire?

day17.question: I hang from the roof and I'm made of frozen water. What am I?
day17.hint: I grow when it's cold and drip when it gets warm.

day24.question: Who wears a red suit and brings joy to children around the world on Christmas Eve?
day24.hint: He has a white beard and says 'Ho ho ho!'

day2.clue: A plant associated with Christmas kisses
day2.hint: You hang it in doorways during the holidays

day8.clue: Hung by the chimney with care
day8.hint: Santa fills it with treats and gifts

day14.hint: Pulled by reindeer across the sky

day20.clue: A soldier who cracks nuts in a famous ballet
day20.hint: Featured in Tchaikovsky's famous Christmas ballet

wordScramble.title: Word Scramble
wordScramble.instruction: Unscramble the letters to form a word!

day3.clue: A unique ice crystal that falls from the sky
day3.hint: It's often used to describe winter precipitation

day19.clue: A spiced cookie often shaped like a person

wordSearch.title: Word Search
wordSearch.instruction: Find all the words in the grid!

day6.hint: A frosty friend with a carrot nose

day13.hint: The most wonderful time of the year

day21.hint: The coldest season of the year

geometryDash.title: Santa's Sprint
geometryDash.instruction: Jump over obstacles and reach the finish line!
geometryDash.controlsDesktop: Press SPACE, W, ↑, or click to jump

flappySleigh.title: Flappy Sleigh
flappySleigh.instruction: Tap or press SPACE to fly! Avoid the candy canes and reach the Christmas tree!
flappySleigh.controlsDesktop: Press SPACE, UP arrow, or click to fly

endless.tagline: Endless flight! Glide between candy canes for as long as you can.
endless.gameLost: You clipped a candy cane! Ready to try again?

presentStacking.title: Present Tower Challenge
presentStacking.instruction1: Click anywhere on the screen to drop a present
presentStacking.instruction2: Stack presents to reach the golden line
presentStacking.instruction4: Plan your drops carefully for a stable tower!
presentStacking.successMessage: Excellent stacking! You used {{used}} out of {{max}} presents.
presentStacking.failedMessage: A present fell out of bounds! Try stacking more carefully.

giftCatcher.title: Gift Catcher
giftCatcher.instruction: Catch the falling gifts! Avoid the coal!
giftCatcher.controlsDesktop: Use LEFT and RIGHT arrow keys to move
giftCatcher.controlsMobile: Tap LEFT or RIGHT side of screen to move

sokoban.title: Gift Puzzle
sokoban.instruction: Push all gifts onto the Christmas trees to win!
sokoban.controlsDesktop: Use arrow keys or WASD to move

climber.title: Christmas Climber
climber.instruction: Climb to the star at the top! Collect ornaments along the way.
climber.controlsDesktop: Press SPACE or click to jump. Time your jumps carefully!
climber.controlsMobile: Tap anywhere to jump. Time your jumps carefully!

endless.tagline: Endless climb! Stay on the platforms and reach new heights.
endless.gameLost: You slipped! Keep climbing to push your record.

mazeRunner.title: Maze Runner
mazeRunner.instruction: Collect all the gifts and bring them to the tree!

funFacts.title: Fun Fact!
funFacts.day2: Jambiz Group was founded in 2010 by two entrepreneurs who wanted to give small businesses access to the same services as large corporations.
funFacts.day3: Jambiz Group has offices in Malmö (Gustav Adolfs torg 51) and Göteborg/Kungsbacka (Magasinsgatan 8c).
funFacts.day4: XBUS (Excellent Business Services) works by three core values: competence, hard work, and having fun!
funFacts.day5: Sprinta delivers products and services worth over 100 million SEK annually to both private and public sector in Sweden.
funFacts.day6: ProgressLEAD specializes in strategy, transformation, project, program and portfolio management.
funFacts.day7: Did you know there is a theater production company in Jamaica also called Jambiz? Talk about a name with international appeal!
funFacts.day8: Exceed Consulting focuses on making a positive difference by helping organizations with quality, sustainability, and business development.
funFacts.day9: SwCG (Swedish Consulting Group) serves as a meeting place for the entire IT industry, connecting clients with the best consultants.
funFacts.day10: Podium System is home to experts in travel and transport, planning and optimization – delivering tailored cloud-based solutions.
funFacts.day11: AnalyticLEAD offers deep expertise in information management, advanced analytics, data science and data governance.
funFacts.day12: LearningLEAD offers coaching, mentorship, courses and workshops within Project Management, Facilitation, and Lean-Agile Transformation (SAFe®).
funFacts.day13: Addends offers facilitation services using LEGO® Serious Play® methodology – believing business can be done better through playfulness!
funFacts.day14: Sprinta created CertumHub – an AI-powered platform for e-learning, compliance management, and sustainability certifications with 50+ course categories!
funFacts.day15: The name 'Jambiz' was created by combining the initials of the founders' names: Jorgen And Mikael's Business = JAMBIZ!
funFacts.day16: Jambiz provides security, development, and growth for member companies through collaboration and economies of scale.
funFacts.day17: XBUS offers support services including HR, Recruitment, Finance, Marketing & Communication, and Office Support – all under one roof!
funFacts.day18: Jambiz Group's vision: "The future of business lies in bringing together people and companies who want to develop themselves and the market."
funFacts.day20: Podium System's cloud platform delivers tailored solutions for customers in public sector, logistics, tourism and transport.
funFacts.day21: LearningLEAD instructors are SAFe® Program Consultants, PMP® certified, and LEGO® Serious Play® certified facilitators.
funFacts.day22: The Jambiz Development Center in Göteborg is formed by developers from both Sprinta and Podium System working together on innovative solutions.
funFacts.day23: Quality, engagement, and playfulness permeate all of Jambiz Group's operations and work methods.
